text: This fabulous hat came from Fabulous Hats by Anne
She is a woman here in Lexington that makes hats,
and when I was Miss Kentucky last year, 2015
she made my hat for the Derby, so I figured
who better than to make my hat for this year's Derby?
And I am SUPER excited! Pink and green are my favorite
colors, and so I am looking forward to showing off
my Fabulous Hat at the Kentucky Derby!
I do not wear hats on the regular.
I own one hat that I wear throughout the year.
So it's always exciting to get a hat that has feathers,
and flowers, and beautiful colors all over the place.
Which is something that I always look forward to.
It's the one time of year in Kentucky
that you really feel like you can
dress up and go big or go home. So I
love getting to wear my Kentucky Derby hats.
